attributes.action: Build the proposed Mosque and community centre in Dudley!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petition is for allowing the go-ahead for the project in the Metropolitan borough of Dudley,which is to build a new mosque and community centre.
The land has been bought by the Dudley Muslim Association from the Dudley council,and will replace the the current mosque.
The reason for building a larger mosque is quite simply to facilitate the needs of the local muslim community of approximately 7000 muslim. Which at present is too overcrowded.
The building currently has capacity for around 470 people, and the new mosque would increase the capacity to 750 people.The proposed building will consist of the mosque itself and a 65ft minaret.
There will also be a Community centre, which will welcome people from all faiths from the local community. 
And a car park, to ensure no congestion is caused during busy periods.
The mosque itself has not received any public money therefore the majority of the funding has come from individual donations by local Muslims, with large amounts raised each year during the time of Ramadan.

HENCE - NO TAX PAYERS MONEY IS SPENT ON THE MOSQUE!
